mapper.select: SELECT grp.group_id, grp.group_category_id, grp.user_id, grp.group_title, grp.user_counting, grp.group_status, grp.create_date, grp.end_date, grp.group_post, grp.is_blinded FROM group_info AS grp JOIN user_info AS usr ON usr.user_id = grp.user_id WHERE grp.group_status = 1 AND usr.course_id = #{courseId} ORDER BY grp.group_id DESC
